segments.text: Happy birthday , Ann . Many happy returns of the day ! Here is a present for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , Peter . Come into the dining room . We are going to cut the cake soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's Cathy . She is pretty , isn't she ? She likes dancing . Ask her to dance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't be afraid . She isn't going to bite you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Who is afraid ? I am not afraid .
segments.speaker: S1
